vote.title: Authorize (1) a construction services contract for the construction of the Roland G. Parrish Park Improvements Project located at 3800 East Kiest Blvd - Joel Brown & Co. LLC dba J.B. & Co. LLC, best value proposer of three; (2) an increase in appropriations not to exceed $1,001,000.00 in the Capital Gifts, Match, Donation & Development Fund; (3) the receipt and deposit of funds in the amount not to exceed $1,001,000.00 in the Capital Gifts, Match, Donation & Development Fund; and (4) the disbursement of funds in an amount not to exceed $1,001,000.00 from the Capital Gifts, Match, Donation & Development Fund - Not to exceed $8,008,297.25 - Financing: Equity Fund ($4,007,297.25); Infrastructure Investment Fund ($3,000,000.00); and Capital Gifts, Match, Donation & Development Fund ($1,001,000.00)
